body_html:
Ping :).

@jihunchoi for right now I just recommend using tf.while_loop. The accompanying TensorArray stuff is a bit messy, but you can create as many TensorArrays as you need, even with different-shaped Tensors inside, bypassing the problems with the higher-level tf.scan.
body_text:
Ping :).
@jihunchoi for right now I just recommend using tf.while_loop. The accompanying TensorArray stuff is a bit messy, but you can create as many TensorArrays as you need, even with different-shaped Tensors inside, bypassing the problems with the higher-level tf.scan.
body:
Ping :).

@jihunchoi for right now I just recommend using `tf.while_loop`. The accompanying `TensorArray` stuff is a bit messy, but you can create as many `TensorArrays` as you need, even with different-shaped `Tensors` inside, bypassing the problems with the higher-level `tf.scan`.
